experiences.description:
helped me get this job
LinkedIn helped me get this job
Responsible for managing own clients using recruitment and deliver high quality of services both candidates and clients with clear objectives in achieving a set goal of the company.

Responsibilities:
- Doing full 360 degree end-to-end recruitment process to generate sales revenue.
- Identifying new business opportunities and establish relationship with potential clients.
- Proactively sourcing quality candidates through various sources.
- Provide prompt and professional services to existing and new clients.
- Work with existing and find new clients and support staff to fill their vacancies,
establish long term relationship with client and interview candidates.
- Maintains a pool of talent by sourcing CVs regularly and interviewing candidates for
existing and future employment opportunities.
- Use various channels for recruitment thereby utilized and implements creative
recruitment solutions in order to fill vacancies with qualified candidates in a timely
manner.
Responsible for managing own clients using recruitment and deliver high quality of services both candidates and clients with clear objectives in achieving a set goal of the company. Responsibilities: - Doing full 360 degree end-to-end recruitment process to generate sales revenue. - Identifying new business opportunities and establish relationship with potential clients. - Proactively sourcing quality candidates through various sources. - Provide prompt and professional services to existing and new clients. - Work with existing and find new clients and support staff to fill their vacancies, establish long term relationship with client and interview candidates. - Maintains a pool of talent by sourcing CVs regularly and interviewing candidates for existing and future employment opportunities. - Use various channels for recruitment thereby utilized and implements creative recruitment solutions in order to fill vacancies with qualified candidates in a timely manner.
Skills: Technical Recruiting · Candidate Assessment · Communication · Negotiation

experiences.location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area

experiences.description:
Main responsibilities:
- Source potential candidates and CVs from various channels/resources (LinkedIn, TopCV, etc.)
- Approach and contact qualified candidates to introduce new positions and induce for applications. 
- Store and input candidates' profiles and relevant information in the company's database.
- Actively participate in recruiting/IT events.
